mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.submission_id, r.test_case_id, r.status, r.error_message, r.time_used, r.memory_used, r.created_at, t.input_path as test_input FROM result r LEFT JOIN test_case t ON r.test_case_id = t.id WHERE r.submission_id = #{submissionId} ORDER BY r.test_case_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO result ( submission_id, test_case_id, status, error_message, time_used, memory_used, created_at ) VALUES ( #{submissionId}, #{testCaseId}, #{status}, #{errorMessage}, #{timeUsed}, #{memoryUsed}, NOW() )
